overview:
Denis has been involved in running a wide range of businesses, exposing him to a myriad of business issues and ways to solve them.

After using many of the existing CRM/PIM tools, he felt that they didn’t address all the needs of the business.

This led to his interest in software, seeking to create a product that would enable the complexities of business management to be handled via a web based system, that all stakeholders could access, yet with the power to handle complex needs.

The volatility of the marketplace, also meant companies needed more flexible staff resourcing. The culmination is -

www.QBIS.net - a web based collaboration and task management engine with built in VOIP, and -

www.gethiredhelp.com - on-demand service staff providor, to handle overflow or projects worldwide.
